official_title: A bill to designate the United States Courthouse located at the intersection of Uniondale Avenue and Hempstead Turnpike in Uniondale, New York, as the "John W. Wydler United States Courthouse".

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended) Designates the United States Post Office located at 600 Franklin Avenue, Garden City, New York, as the John W. Wydler United States Post Office.

titles.title: A bill to designate the United States Courthouse located at the intersection of Uniondale Avenue and Hempstead Turnpike in Uniondale, New York, as the "John W. Wydler United States Courthouse".
